fullwavepy.fd.checks¶

Functions

check_accuracy(dx, v_min, f_max, kernel, …)

Check accuracy of the scheme (kernel).

check_propag_dists(dims, dx, t, v_min, …)

Calculate propagation distance across the model covered by the fastest waves.

check_stability(dx, dt, v_max, kernel, **kwargs)

Check stability of the numerical scheme (kernel).

courant(dx, dt, v_max, **kwargs)

Calculate the Courant’s number describing stability of the numerical scheme.
